title: Seattle SuperSonics
summary: The Seattle SuperSonics, commonly known as the Sonics, were an American professional basketball team based in Seattle. The SuperSonics played in the National Basketball Association (NBA) as a member club of the league's Western Conference Pacific and Northwest divisions from 1967 until 2008. After the 2007â€“08 season ended, the team relocated to Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, and now play as the Oklahoma City Thunder.
